mapper.insert: insert into project (id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assistantManagerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update project set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, assistant_manager_id = #{assistantManagerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from project where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flg="0"
select id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from project where del_flg="0"

select p.id, p.name, p.manager_id as managerId, p.assistant_manager_id as assistantManagerId, p.remark, p.del_flg as delFlg, p.version, p.create_id as createId, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_id as updateId, p.update_time as updateTime, s.name as managerName,st.name as assistantManagerName from project p left join project_staff ps on p.manager_id=ps.id and ps.del_flg="0" left join staff s on ps.staff_id=s.id and s.del_flg="0" left join project_staff pst on p.assistant_manager_id=pst.id and pst.del_flg="0" left join staff st on pst.staff_id=st.id and st.del_flg="0" where p.del_flg="0"
select id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from project where name=#{name} and del_flg="0"
select id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from project where manager_id=#{managerId} and del_flg="0"

select id, name, manager_id, assistant_manager_id, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from project where assistant_manager_id=#{assistantManagerId} and del_flg="0"
